page.h1: OpenMath TN meeting: 10 years of OpenMath
page.p: The meeting will feature general talks on the developments during the last 10 years since the first OpenMath meeting which took place at ETH in December 1993.
Please contact Mika Seppälä if you want to give a talk. The annual meeting of the OpenMath Society will take place on Friday, May 21.
